con:part.con:content: <wsdl:definitions name="Notification" targetNamespace="http://www.alainn.com/SOA/service/Notification/1.0" xmlns:mes="http://www.alainn.com/SOA/message/1.0" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:tns="http://www.alainn.com/SOA/service/Notification/1.0"> <wsdl:types> <xsd:schema> <xsd:import namespace="http://www.alainn.com/SOA/message/1.0" schemaLocation="SOA-Message-1.0.xsd"/> </xsd:schema> </wsdl:types> <wsdl:message name="notifySKUItemMovement"> <wsdl:part element="mes:notifySKUItemMovement" name="parameters"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="notifySKUItemMovementResponse"> <wsdl:part element="mes:notifySKUItemMovementResponse" name="parameters"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:portType name="Notification"> <wsdl:operation name="notifySKUItemMovement"> <wsdl:input message="tns:notifySKUItemMovement"/> <wsdl:output message="tns:notifySKUItemMovementResponse"/> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:portType> <wsdl:binding name="NotificationSoap" type="tns:Notification"> <soap:binding style="document" transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <wsdl:operation name="notifySKUItemMovement"> <soap:operation soapAction="http://www.alainn.com/SOA/service/Notification/1.0/notifySKUItemMovement"/> <wsdl:input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:binding> <wsdl:service name="NotificationService"> <wsdl:port binding="tns:NotificationSoap" name="NotificationPort"> <soap:address location="http://www.alainn.com"/> </wsdl:port> </wsdl:service> </wsdl:definitions>

<schema targetNamespace="http://www.alainn.com/SOA/message/1.0" elementFormDefault="unqualified" xmlns:mod="http://www.alainn.com/SOA/model/1.0" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:tns="http://www.alainn.com/SOA/message/1.0"> <import namespace="http://www.alainn.com/SOA/model/1.0" schemaLocation="SOA-Model-1.0.xsd"/> <element name="notifySKUItemMovement"> <complexType> <sequence> <element ref="mod:TransactedSku" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </sequence> </complexType> </element> <element name="notifySKUItemMovementResponse"></element> <element name="ItemSearchCriteria"> <complexType> <all> <element name="type" type="string"/> <element name="name" type="string"/> </all> </complexType> </element> <element name="PageInfo"> <complexType> <sequence> <element name="pageIndex" type="integer"/> <element name="pageSize" type="integer"/> </sequence> </complexType> </element> <element name="getCustomer"> <complexType> <choice> <element ref="mod:Email"/> <element ref="mod:CustomerId"/> </choice> </complexType> </element> <element name="getCustomerResponse"> <complexType> <sequence> <element ref="mod:Customer"/> </sequence> </complexType> </element> <element name="processOrder"> <complexType> <sequence> <element ref="mod:Customer"/> <element ref="mod:Order"/> </sequence> </complexType> </element> <element name="processOrderResponse"> <complexType> <sequence> <element ref="mod:OrderId"/> </sequence> </complexType> </element> <element name="processRegistration"> <complexType> <sequence> <element ref="mod:Customer"/> </sequence> </complexType> </element> <element name="processRegistrationResponse"> <complexType> <sequence> <element ref="mod:CustomerRegistrationStatus"/> </sequence> </complexType> </element> <element name="checkRegistrationEmail"> <complexType> <sequence> <element ref="mod:Email"/> </sequence> </complexType> </element> <element name="checkRegistrationEmailResponse"> <complexType> <sequence> <element ref="mod:EmailAvailability"/> </sequence> </complexType> </element> <element name="getBasket"> <complexType> <sequence> <element ref="tns:PageInfo"/> <element ref="mod:CustomerId"/> </sequence> </complexType> </element> <element name="getBasketResponse"> <complexType> <sequence> <element ref="tns:PageInfo"/> <element ref="mod:BasketItem" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </sequence> </complexType> </element> <element name="addToBasket"> <complexType> <sequence> <element ref="mod:CustomerId"/> <element ref="mod:BasketItem"/> </sequence> </complexType> </element> <element name="addToBasketResponse"></element> <element name="removeFromBasket"> <complexType> <sequence> <element ref="mod:CustomerId"/> <element ref="mod:Sku"/> </sequence> </complexType> </element> <element name="removeFromBasketResponse"></element> <element name="saveOrder"> <complexType> <sequence> <element ref="mod:CustomerId"/> <element ref="mod:Order"/> </sequence> </complexType> </element> <element name="saveOrderResponse"> <complexType> <sequence> <element ref="mod:OrderId"/> </sequence> </complexType> </element> <element name="getOrderDetails"> <complexType> <sequence> <element ref="mod:CustomerId"/> <element ref="mod:Order"/> </sequence> </complexType> </element> <element name="getOrderDetailsResponse"> <complexType> <sequence> <element ref="mod:Order"/> </sequence> </complexType> </element> <element name="processSale"> <complexType> <sequence> <element ref="mod:Customer"/> <element ref="mod:Sale"/> </sequence> </complexType> </element> <element name="processSaleResponse"> <complexType> <sequence> <element ref="mod:SaleId"/> </sequence> </complexType> </element> <element name="saveSale"> <complexType> <sequence> <element ref="mod:CustomerId"/> <element ref="mod:Sale"/> </sequence> </complexType> </element> <element name="saveSaleResponse"> <complexType> <sequence> <element ref="mod:SaleId"/> </sequence> </complexType> </element> <element name="addWish"> <complexType> <sequence> <element ref="mod:CustomerId"/> <element ref="mod:Sku"/> </sequence> </complexType> </element> <element name="addWishResponse"></element> <element name="removeWish"> <complexType> <sequence> <element ref="mod:CustomerId"/> <element ref="mod:Sku"/> </sequence> </complexType> </element> <element name="removeWishResponse"></element> <element name="getWishList"> <complexType> <sequence> <element ref="tns:PageInfo"/> <element ref="mod:CustomerId"/> </sequence> </complexType> </element> <element name="getWishListResponse"> <complexType> <sequence> <element ref="tns:PageInfo"/> <element ref="mod:ItemSku" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </sequence> </complexType> </element> <element name="getItems"> <complexType> <sequence> <element ref="tns:PageInfo"/> <element ref="tns:ItemSearchCriteria" minOccurs="0"/> </sequence> </complexType> </element> <element name="getItemsResponse"> <complexType> <sequence> <element ref="tns:PageInfo"/> <element ref="mod:Item" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </sequence> </complexType> </element> <element name="getItem"> <complexType> <sequence> <element ref="mod:ItemId"/> </sequence> </complexType> </element> <element name="getItemResponse"> <complexType> <sequence> <element ref="mod:Item"/> <element ref="mod:ItemSku" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </sequence> </complexType> </element> <element name="modifySKUStockCount"> <complexType> <sequence> <element ref="mod:TransactedSku" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </sequence> </complexType> </element> <element name="modifySKUStockCountResponse"/> <element name="addLoyaltyPoints"> <complexType> <sequence> <element ref="mod:CustomerId"/> <element ref="mod:CustomerLoyaltyPoints"/> </sequence> </complexType> </element> <element name="addLoyaltyPointsResponse"></element> <element name="addMobileToken"> <complexType> <sequence> <element ref="mod:CustomerId"/> <element ref="mod:MobileToken"/> </sequence> </complexType> </element> <element name="addMobileTokenResponse"></element> <element name="calculateDiscount"> <complexType> <sequence> <element ref="mod:Customer"/> <choice> <element ref="mod:Order"/> <element ref="mod:Sale"/> </choice> </sequence> </complexType> </element> <element name="calculateDiscountResponse"> <complexType> <sequence> <element ref="mod:Discount"/> </sequence> </complexType> </element> <element name="distributeOrder"> <complexType> <sequence> <element ref="mod:Order"/> </sequence> </complexType> </element> <element name="distributeOrderResponse"></element> </schema>

<schema targetNamespace="http://www.alainn.com/SOA/model/1.0" elementFormDefault="unqualified" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:tns="http://www.alainn.com/SOA/model/1.0"> <element name="Customer" type="tns:customerType"/> <element name="Item" type="tns:itemType"/> <element name="ItemSku" type="tns:skuType"/> <element name="TransactedSku" type="tns:transactedSkuType"/> <element name="ItemId" type="string"/> <element name="Order" type="tns:orderType"/> <element name="OrderId" type="string"/> <element name="Sale" type="tns:saleType"/> <element name="SaleId" type="string"/> <element name="BasketItem" type="tns:transactedSkuType"/> <element name="Sku" type="string"/> <element name="Email" type="string"/> <element name="CustomerId" type="string"/> <element name="CustomerRegistrationStatus" type="tns:customerRegistrationStatusType"/> <element name="EmailAvailability" type="tns:emailAvailabilityType"/> <element name="CustomerLoyaltyPoints" type="integer"/> <element name="MobileToken" type="string"/> <element name="Discount" type="float"/> <complexType name="customerType"> <sequence> <element name="id" type="string"/> <element name="firstName" type="string"/> <element name="lastName" type="string"/> <element name="email" type="string"/> <element name="mobilePhoneNumber" type="string"/> <element name="loyaltyPoints" type="integer"/> <element name="mobileTokens" type="tns:mobileTokensType"/> <element name="notificationPreferences"> <complexType> <sequence> <element name="preference" maxOccurs="unbounded"> <simpleType> <restriction base="string"> <enumeration value="Email"/> <enumeration value="Sms"/> <enumeration value="Web"/> <enumeration value="Mobile Push"/> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> </sequence> </complexType> </element> </sequence> </complexType> <group name="basicItemInformation"> <sequence> <element name="id" type="string"/> <element name="type" type="string"/> <element name="name" type="string"/> <element name="summary" type="string"/> <element name="imageUrl" type="string"/> </sequence> </group> <complexType name="itemType"> <sequence> <group ref="tns:basicItemInformation"/> <element name="description" type="string"/> </sequence> </complexType> <complexType name="skuType"> <sequence> <group ref="tns:basicItemInformation"/> <element name="sku" type="string"/> <element name="price" type="float"/> <element name="quantityInStock" type="integer"/> <element name="characteristics"> <complexType> <sequence> <element name="characteristic" maxOccurs="unbounded"> <complexType> <simpleContent> <extension base="string"> <attribute name="name" type="string"/> </extension> </simpleContent> </complexType> </element> </sequence> </complexType> </element> </sequence> </complexType> <complexType name="transactedSkuType"> <complexContent> <extension base="tns:skuType"> <sequence> <element name="transactionQuantity" type="integer"/> </sequence> </extension> </complexContent> </complexType> <complexType name="orderSkuType"> <complexContent> <extension base="tns:transactedSkuType"> <sequence> <element name="status" minOccurs="0"> <simpleType> <restriction base="string"> <enumeration value="Pending"/> <enumeration value="Ready for Distribution"/> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> </sequence> </extension> </complexContent> </complexType> <complexType name="orderType"> <sequence> <element name="id" type="long" minOccurs="0"/> <element name="total" type="float"/> <element name="discount" type="float" minOccurs="0"/> <element name="pickupLocation" type="string"/> <element name="pickupDate" type="date" minOccurs="0"/> <element name="items"> <complexType> <sequence> <element name="item" type="tns:orderSkuType" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </sequence> </complexType> </element> </sequence> </complexType> <complexType name="saleType"> <sequence> <element name="id" type="long" minOccurs="0"/> <element name="total" type="float"/> <element name="discount" type="float" minOccurs="0"/> <element name="date" type="date" minOccurs="0"/> <element name="items"> <complexType> <sequence> <element name="item" type="tns:transactedSkuType" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </sequence> </complexType> </element> </sequence> </complexType> <simpleType name="customerRegistrationStatusType"> <restriction base="string"> <enumeration value="Pending"/> <enumeration value="Confirmed"/> </restriction> </simpleType> <simpleType name="emailAvailabilityType"> <restriction base="string"> <enumeration value="Available"/> <enumeration value="Taken"/> </restriction> </simpleType> <complexType name="mobileTokensType"> <sequence> <element name="token" type="string" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </sequence> </complexType> </schema>
